item.title: When you wish upon a...
item.description: When you wish upon a… Star light, star bright, First star I see tonight; I wish I may, I wish I might Know if you are a Starlink satellite 2022 has been a year defined by corporations releasing products and services without any thought given to consequences or even such piffling factors as ethics and morality. SpaceX, an Elon Musk company, pushed 100s of satellites into the sky causing havoc for earthbound astronomers.

item.title: All things will die
item.description: All things will die The Guardian posted an article today looking at the impact and future of Metaâ€™s Metaverse project. It is not a good read if you are holding Meta stock but I guess nothing really has been for the last few months. What I found most interesting in the article were the comments from Meta vice-president Vishal Shah trying to get his staff and developers to use their own VR software.
